resources.string: Skin Clinic is a Skin Disease Detection App. It deals with the three most common skin diseases which are Impetigo, Melanoma, Eczema. This app will allow the human to detect the skin disease. Also it tends to provide almost accurate results where multiple users can access it nearly at no cost. Thus our mission is to help people recognize early detection of skin disease.
You need more information? Please feel free to contact.
Play the video to get the knowledge about how to use the app.
